TBD
Help Grimbold fight!
Grimbold is unmoved by your account

Grimbold has stopped short, his voice dropped to a whisper.

'Look out ahead. Do you see the size of that troll?

'We must try to take him down. I do not think we will die today, [placeholder], however the odds may be against us. For Rohan!'

'You have found Grimbold, and Erkenbrand has found us! This is an unexpected turn of fortune indeed. \n\n'I am sorry that your reunion must be swift, but we cannot tarry here, my friends. It is to the Hornburg that we must look.'
'Erkenbrand, lead on! We will go to your encampment, for we must plan our next move at once.'
Bosnauk is defeated!
Grimbold sits stubbornly, unmoving

TBD
Tell Grimbold the <rgb=#FF0000>story</rgb> of the king
Éomer's tale is done. You should now return your thoughts to the men gathered at Helm's Gate, waiting for Gandalf and hoping that Erkenbrand will return soon.
'Leave me be and let the enemy come. Just let them come! I will fall here with Prince Théodred.\n\n'I should have been the one to die, not him, for I had nothing to live for.'
Instance: The Mustering

'If my aging king can bring himself from a warm hearth and soft chair, then I will not yet condemn Rohan as lost. I will fight for Théoden, as I have always done!\n\n'Erkenbrand, Erkenbrand. We must find him, for he had good soldiers with him before we were split asunder. Erkenbrand! He cannot be far.'
You must convince Grimbold that he is wrong....
